page.title: 02The Village Forge.
page.content: Mr.Potter owns the Forge in Brailsford.He has been working here since 1970.He starts work at 8.30am and finishes between 5.00pm and 10.00pm depending on how busy he is.He gets 15-20 customers a week.The metal he uses is mild steel and it gets up to 1000 Celsius.The fire gets up to about 1500 Celsius and the fuel he uses is gas,coke and electricity.His main products are dog grates.It is a dangerous job because sparks fly and the tools are dangerous.His tools are rivets,band saws and drills.He started the job as a hobby.It took him four years to learn the job.The forge was taken from a school and the building used to be a cow shed.
